channel.title: Remember RsN?
channel.description:
I've been talking to a guy over PM claiming to be RsN coming back after many years off, but he really doesn't seem like RsN at all who I believe I talked to over MSN back when I used it and he used to write SCAR scripts at kaitnieks.com like I did. I think he is the one who worked with Mutant Squirrel quite often. Does anyone else remember him? Or better yet still have him on MSN? Here is our full conversation, and it just doesn't seem like him at all to me. I'd think he would have at least mentioned kaitnieks and scripting for SCAR, which he didn't at all.
[quote="Moparisthebest"][quote author=possibly RsN] I Have been hacked as i have rememberd this account this is my old one i used to spy on people without gettin pm's but my following account 'RsN' has been hacked and i have proof its mine because it is still got my msn on it which the hacker forgot to remove my email is 'Dev_iant@hotmail.com' if you want proof that is me please message me on msn and i will prove to you.
Thank You For Reading i hope i get my account back soon. [/quote] If he hasn't changed your email then you can recover your account yourself, by requesting a password change which will be sent to that email.[/quote] [quote="Moparisthebest"][quote author=possibly RsN] i cannot i think they changed the recovery email because it doesnt send to me when i done it [/quote]
When do you think you last logged in to that account? Also, try to give me some sort of proof you are RsN. Give me some history, what you did in the past, what websites you did them on, etc etc.[/quote] [quote="Moparisthebest"][quote author=possibly RsN] RsN was a random username i used im known as sir jordan or xaxosi on most stuff last online around december 2007 but that is my account and i have decided to come back to computer stuff now so i have decided to join here again [/quote]
RsN was a respected member of the community and he was on sites before this one, back in 05 at least and probably before. He programmed certain things and I remember talking to him back when I still used MSN in 05. If you can tell me what you did back then, and I know of at least one other site you used to frequent back then, then I'll recover your account for you. At this point I'm just not sure your the same RsN that frequented these forums back then. Get back to me.[/quote] [quote="Moparisthebest"][quote author=possibly RsN] the main stuff i used to do was runescape developing i cant really remember what stuff i used to use on my computer the reason i wasnt on for a long period of time was because my computer got a virus and my dad wouldnt buy a new one, for fact i no i used silab and google and mopar forums i used to use them quite regularly and any new forums i heard about i used to go on them, and start posting i joined alot of forums before so i cant really narrow that down but that really is my account. and i was going to create a server 317 best i could because i was getting back into it since i have nothing else to do. [/quote]
The main question you still haven't answered is what forums were you on directly before these forums were created?[/quote]
So what do you guys think?

item.title: Remember RsN?
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:24, topic:350655”][quote author=Greeny link=topic=447012.msg3301902#msg3301902 date=1281371400]
It’s definitely not him, pretty sure that it’s abundantly clear now but I thought I’d join the posting bandwagon.
[/quote]

It is clear. I did send him a PM after Fakawi posted asking him his name, and he never got back to me. What a horrible attempt at hi-jacking an account. Hehe.[/quote]it was good enough to make you research about it

Read full topic

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:24, topic:350655”][quote author=Greeny link=topic=447012.msg3301902#msg3301902 date=1281371400]
It’s definitely not him, pretty sure that it’s abundantly clear now but I thought I’d join the posting bandwagon.
[/quote]

It is clear. I did send him a PM after Fakawi posted asking him his name, and he never got back to me. What a horrible attempt at hi-jacking an account. Hehe.[/quote]

Ghehe, gj!

btw: RsN stands for…runescapenoob. I bet you can still find remnants of his code in SRL. He was at the time one of the most efficient and esthetic coders.
